Package org.opennars.interfaces.pub

Interface Reasoner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Eventable, InputFileConsumer, Multistepable, NarseseConsumer, Pluggable, Resettable, SensoryChannelConsumer, TaskConsumer<Reasoner>, Timable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Nar
    public interface Reasoner
extends SensoryChannelConsumer, Resettable, NarseseConsumer, InputFileConsumer, TaskConsumer<Reasoner>, Eventable, Pluggable, Multistepable, Timable
    Implementations implement a full Non-axiomatic-reasoner
    Author:
    Robert WÃ¼nsche

      • ask

        Reasoner ask​(String termString,
             AnswerHandler answered)
      throws Parser.InvalidInputException
        ask reasoner a eternal question
        Parameters:
        termString - narsese string with term of question
        answered - handler which will be called when answered
        Returns:
        reasoner which processes the question
        Throws:
        Parser.InvalidInputException

      • getMinCyclePeriodMS

        returns the minimum delay of a cycle in milliseconds
        Returns:
        minimum cycle delay period

      • setThreadYield

        void setThreadYield​(boolean b)
        When b is true, Nar will call Thread.yield each run() iteration that minCyclePeriodMS==0 (no delay). This is for improving program responsiveness when Nar is run with no delay.
        Parameters:
        b - Nar will call Thread.yield each run()
